lead_paragraph: Activity at China's factories slowed in December but still represented the fifth consecutive month of expansion in the latest sign that the world's No. 2 economy is stabilizing.
snippet: Activity at China's factories slowed in December but still represented the fifth consecutive month of expansion in the latest sign that the world's No. 2 economy is stabilizing....

headline.main: China's Manufacturing Expands for 5th Consecutive Month
headline.print_headline: China's Manufacturing Expands for 5th Consecutive Month
